description: SPEAKING and LISTENING BIBLE This software enables you to let your Android Smartphone or Tablet read Bible verses, chapters and books aloud. By speaking to your Android device you can also instruct "Bible Talk" which parts of the Bible to read aloud! Just touch the microphone button and say what you are looking for. Bible Talk is also suitable for blind and visually impaired users. You can choose from no less than 5 different Bible versions: - King James Version, 1611. - American Standard Version, 1901. - Good News Bible, 1992. - Contemporary English Version, 1999. - World English Bible. It is also possible to find a passage in the Bible by typing its title. The format to find something in the Bible is as follows: - Book Name, Chapter number, Verse number, or - Book Name, Chapter number, Verse number to Verse number" (range of verses) Examples: - "Genesis". - "Lucas four". - "James Chapter Two". - "Mark Verse three". - "Exodus Chapter Four Verse three". - "Acts six verse one to six." - "Ecclesiastes Chapter Five Verse three to seven." The "Talking Bible" software provides five modes: 1. Bible Search and Read mode. 2. Bible index Old and New Testament. 3. Bible version selection. 4. Preference Settings. 5. Read the User Guide. An extra feature is that you can ask Bible Talk some simple questions like: - "What is the [third] commandment". - "Who is the Pope". This feature will be expanded in future versions (free of charge to Bible Talk buyers). Finally it should be pointed out that this software has two display modes: plain text and the original webpage on the Bible website. You can toggle between both modes with the Arrow-Right and -Left buttons. The text (font) can be changed in size and colour. Notes: 1. Please note that the Speaking Bible has the status of a talking and listening browser that accesses an excellent online Bible. 2. We recommend that you install a better quality voice than the standard Google Pico voices. Good voices are available in the Google Play Store by companies like SVox, Acapela, Ivona and Cereproc. We hope you will enjoy the use of this software! DSH electronics Leidschendam The Netherlands www.dsh2000.com info@dsh2000.com .

description: ☆ Epic 3D Tunnel - Limited Version ☆ Remember, live wallpapers are only locatable via the live wallpaper selection screen, not the app directory! This trial version offers limited functionality compared to the full version. In this limited version, you will have access to 10 unique textures, as well as the ability to use your own images as textures. You will also have the ability to adjust the three following settings: •6 various movement speeds •Select from normal or large tunnel diameters •Change movement direction between forward, backward, or both ★ UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSION TO UNLOCK THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL FEATURES! ★ •40 unique textures, including the ability to use your own images from your gallery as textures •This isn't just a tunnel; currently, additional perspectives include Hyperspace, Floating Path, and Chasm •17 different colors to use as the "light at the end of the tunnel" •Adjust the curvature from light to average to heavy •Switch between linear and mipmap texture rendering To see a video demonstration, follow this link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W560mdi9BwI ENJOY!!

Stopwatch One, a timekeeping app, offers an advanced stopwatch. Whether you're a single athlete wanting to time yourself, or you're in charge of a participant, this versatile app is up to the challenge. The full-featured app SportsTimer pro is also available in the Market. Record all your laps and stay informed about each lap performance. This stopwatch can be controlled in all situations--even while you're moving--because it offers optional tactile feedback and additional control through the volume buttons. At the end of the action, you can check all your lap times, save the result in a time history or send the complete result to your friends. Optional you can export the data to your device's SD card. Your time history is saved in a file format that can be even opened and edited in Excel. FEATURE LIST: - display can contains the total and lap time - recording of laps & elapsed times - shows delta to best lap time - Tactile feedback - Control stopwatches by volume buttons - Different layouts for landscape and portrait mode - Saving up to 10 result in timing history. Options Sharing options -Save results to SD-card in csv-format -Sharing results via email, sms, twitter etc Interface options - Setup orientation mode - Setup wake lock mode
release_text: - Action Bar design - New chart view for lap times

description: Easily manage and see the details of your 2 Degrees account on your android phone. If you have problems, such as data that is not being displayed correctly, please email me as I cannot respond to comments on the android market to get the details I need to fix the issues. - Compatible with both prepay accounts and pay monthly accounts. - Widget showing main details - 1x2 and 2x2 sizes available - Set background, transparency, and text size on the widget - Full details viewable in application - Configurable update intervals - Easily purchase value packs through the application. You must confirm before any purchase is made. Data is retrieved over the internet from the 2degrees website, so a internet connection is required to update. Automatic updates may be turned off, or restricted to wifi, in the settings. Explanation of permissions: - Internet: To retrieve data - Phone state: For restricting updates to wifi only etc. - SMS Messages: For the buying of data packs - this application only sends messages to 233 to buy these packs. If you have any problems or suggestions feel free to email me! Want to make this app better? Clone the sources from https://github.com/jordan-thoms/2Degrees-Toolbox and send me a pull request! description: The software "Muscle Contraction : Biochemical Aspects of Sportive Practice" was designed to promote the association between the content of a basic undergraduate biochemistry course and the professional activities of physical education students. The software contains four main content sections (A) Structure of skeletal muscle. (B) Contraction mechanism. (C) Metabolism. (D) Questions. Article published about this software: Galembeck E, Macedo DV, Torres BB, Different energy sources in sports - Introductory software, BIOCHEMISTRY AND MOLECULAR BIOLOGY EDUCATION 31 (3): 204-208 MAY-JUN 2003.

App Placar UOL está mais completo e de cara nova. O novo Placar UOL traz agora muito mais informação, opinião de blogueiros e interatividade. Disponível para smartphones Android, o aplicativo tem os principais jogos do Brasileirão, Estaduais, Copa do Brasil, Libertadores, Espanhol, Inglês, Francês e os mais disputados campeonatos do mundo. Você poderá favoritar até seis times para receber informações personalizadas, como calendário de jogos, notícias, fotos e vídeos, além de notificações de início, gols marcados e término de partida. O lance a lance ainda permite que você avalie os jogadores das duas equipes e o árbitro da partida. Para quem prefere acompanhar o Placar UOL enquanto assiste aos jogos pela televisão, o aplicativo tem a opção “Vendo pela TV”, que habilita uma versão do placar editada, com as opiniões dos especialistas, comentários das redes sociais, avaliação dos atletas, além dos principais lances do jogo marcados em uma linha do tempo. Desenvolvido para proporcionar uma navegação rápida e confortável, as informações contidas no aplicativo são atualizadas automaticamente. O UOL, maior empresa brasileira de conteúdo e serviços de internet, oferece todos estes recursos gratuitamente. App Score UOL is more complete and a new look.   The new Score brings UOL now much more information, opinion bloggers and interactivity. Available for Android smartphones, the application has the key of the Brasileirão games, State, Brazil Cup, Copa Libertadores, Spanish, English, French and the most played in the world championships. You can favoritar up to six times to get personalized information such as games calendar, news, photos and videos, as well as early notification, goals scored and starting end. The move after move also allows you to evaluate the players from both teams and the referee of the match. For those who prefer track Score UOL while watching the games on television, the application has the "Buy on TV", which enables a version of the edited score, with the opinions of experts, reviews of social networks, evaluation of athletes, in addition to main game throws scored in a timeline.   Designed to provide a quick and comfortable navigation, the information contained in the application are automatically updated. The UOL, Brazil's largest content and internet services, offers all of these features for free.

A TIM trabalha para você falar mais, fazer mais e ir mais longe. Por isso, o aplicativo Portas Abertas foi criado para você acompanhar de perto as melhorias que estão sendo feitas. Em poucos cliques, você pode colaborar registrando o que acontece em sua região. Você também pode consultar o mapa de cobertura de onde estiver. • Visualize a cobertura TIM 2G, 3G e 4G, além da localização das antenas atuais e planejadas. • Receba alertas de rede: fique informado sobre otimizações programadas e incidentes em andamento perto de você. • Colabore com a melhora do serviço na sua região: informe, de forma simples e rápida, qualquer problema na ligação ou na conexão de internet e ajude a melhorar os serviços da TIM. Através de seus reportes, vamos trabalhar para aprimorar nossos serviços cada vez mais. Qualidade, transparência e inovação. Saiba mais em: http://tim.com.br/portasabertas Se você precisar de um atendimento específico para seu caso, entre em contato através dos nossos canais de atendimento: http://www.tim.com.br/para-voce/atendimento . TIM works for you talk more, do more and go further. Therefore, the Compass app was created for you to closely monitor the improvements that are being made. In a few clicks, you can collaborate recording what happens in your area. You can also check the coverage map of where you are.   • Visualize coverage TIM 2G, 3G and 4G, plus the location of current and planned antennas. • Receive alerts network: stay informed about planned enhancements and ongoing incidents near you.   • Collaborate with the improvement of the service in your region: report, simply and quickly, any connection problem or internet connection and help improve services TIM. Through their reports, we will work to improve our services even more.     Quality, transparency and innovation. Gerenciador financeiro para controle de despesas pessoais de forma simples e rápida, tendo num único local o controle de seu dinheiro, saldo em contas bancárias e controle da fatura do cartão de crédito, mantendo facilmente o controle de sua finança mensal. Com o Finanças Total você pode possui: ► Agilidade no lançamento de despesas no dia a dia. ► Possibilidade de controle da fatura de cartão de crédito. ► Categorização das despesas. ► Proteção de acesso a suas informações com senha caso necessário. ► Controle do ganho e despesa mensal. ► Possibilidade de exportar suas movimentações para Excel. ► Controle de previsões de pagamentos e recebimentos. ► Controle automatizado de lançamentos fixos (Água, luz, telefone, salário, entre outros). ► Gráficos para analise de gastos/recebimentos. ► Backup/Restore de dados. O aplicativo é totalmente gratuito durante os 45 primeiros dias, após este período continuará gratuito para quem controlar até R$ 1.400 de débitos mensais (Sem restrições para créditos). Ultrapassando este limite você ficará impossibilitado de efetuar novos lançamentos no mês em questão, ao iniciar um novo mês você poderá voltar a lançar seus débitos gratuitamente até atingir o limite. Para liberar o sistema e utiliza-lo sem limites você deve ir na opção "Loja" e adquirir a assinatura anual por apenas R$ 9,99 (Valor único por ano de utilização). A cobrança deste valor é controlada automaticamente pelo Google e a cada período de tempo de um ano será realizada a cobrança da licença. Para cancelar a assinatura você deve ir na opção "Minhas assinaturas" do Google Play que aparecerá na página do aplicativo depois de adquirida a licença e cancelar a cobrança da mesma, você continuará tendo acesso a versão completa do sistema até o final do período adquirido, ao final você voltará a ser um usuário gratuito e não será mais realizada nenhuma cobrança. e-mail para contato: nsp.financastotal@gmail.com Perfil facebook: http://goo.gl/CjOJlb Perfil google+: http://goo.gl/fTyppr Financial manager to control personal expenses quickly and easily, and in one place control of your money balance in bank accounts and control of the credit card bill, easily keeping track of your monthly finance.     With the Total Finance you can have: ► Agility in start-up costs on a daily basis. ► Possibility to control the credit card bill. ► Categorization costs. ► Access Protection to your information with password if needed. ► Gain Control and monthly expense. ► Possibility to export your drives for Excel. ► Control of payment forecasts and receipts. ► Automated control of fixed releases (water, electricity, telephone, salary, etc.). ► charts for analysis of expenditure / receipts. ► Backup / Restore data.     The application is completely free for the first 45 days, after this period will remain free for the control up to £ 1,400 monthly debts (No restrictions for credits). Exceeding this limit you will be unable to make new releases in the month in question, to start a new month you can re-launch their debts free up to the limit. To release the system and use it without limits you should go on the "Store" and purchase the annual subscription for only $ 9.99 (single value per year of use). The collection of this value is controlled automatically by Google and every time one year of collecting the license will be held. To unsubscribe you should go in the "My Subscriptions" Google Play that will appear on the application page after acquired the license and cancel the collection of the same, you still have access to the full version of the system by the end of the purchased period, the end you will again be a free member and is not charging any more fulfilled.   E-mail contact: nsp.financastotal@gmail.com   Profile facebook: http://goo.gl/CjOJlb Profile google +: http://goo.gl/fTyppr

description: Convert Degrees Celsius (° C) to Fahrenheit (° F) and vice versa.Com this app you discover the two values ​​in a simple and functional touch. Try it! Two scales that measure different but the same criterion temperature. Celsius preferred to consider the zero temperature freezing point of water and 100 as the temperature of boiling water water. Have Fahrenheit used other criteria. For the zero point determined using a mixture of water, crushed ice, salt and ammonia. Have to point 100, used his own body temperature, something close to 37 degrees celsius we know. Do you want to call someone or a company and do not want them to have your number? Hide Number is the solution. Block your cell phone number and don’t be identified by caller ID boxes and other caller identification systems. When enabled, Hide Number will hide your telephone number from caller identifiers on mobile and landlines, so that the other party receives the call as "Private" or "Unknown" or "Hidden". You don't need to keep changing the general settings of your Android every time you wish to make a hidden call anymore. The app provides an easy way for you to enable and disable the sending of your number or ID to other phones or caller ID identifiers. * PLEASE NOTE: The application does not allow hiding the originator of SMS messages. The application may not block your phone number for calls to emergency services. Your network-operator must support hiding your caller ID, Indian cell phone operators don't support that! In india the blocking of caller id, CLIR, Caller Line Identification Restriction, is only available in some carriers, ex. Airtel, in post-paid plans with additional cost. ✔ FULLY COMPATIBLE with a wide number of GSM operators worldwide ✔ *** Features *** ✔ Hide your caller ID for outbound calls. ✔ Hide Caller ID for specific numbers only (Block list / Black List) ✔ Status bar notification, indicating when the application is running and if it is hiding the ID of your calls. ✔ Once you buy the application, you are entitled to all its future upgrades. ✔ The application allows you to add a custom block code provided by your mobile operator. ✔ Widget to turn on / off the app functionality. ** Important Notes - Read before you buy ** ✔ Hide Number will work with GSM operators from different countries. ✔ If after activating the program, your number continues to be shown to the other party, contact your mobile service provider and request activation of the service "blocking or barring outbound caller ID". Some operators may charge for this service. ✔ For suggestions and comments do not forget to send us an e-mail so we can get in touch. The comments field of the Market doesn’t let we know your e-mail. ✔✔ Attention ✔✔ Test the app by calling any number and check if the ID was blocked. If it does not work with your operator, you have 15 minutes to return the application to the Market and get your money back. * Operators BR * ✔ TIM – Ok. ✔ Vivo – Ok. ✔ Oi – Need to request activation of the service. ✔ Claro – Need to request activation of the service. ✔ Aeiou – To be tested. ✔ CTBC – To be tested. ✔ Nextel – To be tested. ✔ Sercomtel – To be tested. * Operators Other * ✔ Telecom Italia Mobile - Ok ✔ Wind Italia - Ok ✔ Vodafone - Ok ✔ CTMR Cel - Ok ✔ T-Mobile - US - Ok ✔ Teleacre Cel - Ok ✔ H3G - Ok ✔ ATL Algar - Ok ✔ Telesc Cel - Ok ✔ AT&T - Ok ✔ Red Pocket Mobile USA - Ok ✔ Simple Mobile - Ok ✔ Airtel India Post-paid - Maybe ✔ Simobil Vodafone Slovenia - Ok ✔ Bouygues Telecom - France - Ok Icon by Http://www.androidicons.com (licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.)

Este é o mais novo aplicativo do DETRAN Ceará. Com ele os usuários de smartphones e tablets obtém acesso rápido e amigável a: - Informações da Carteira Nacional de Habilitação (pontuação, vencimento e renovação). - Consulta de veículos pela placa e/ou renavam. - Geração de código de barras para pagamento de taxas via Internet Banking. - Informações sobre transporte rodoviário intermunicipal de passageiros(ônibus e vans) - Envio de críticas, reclamações e denúncias diretamente para a ouvidoria do órgão. - Meu Detran Mobile: o sistema integrado de gestão de CNH e veículos do Detran na palma da sua mão. - Muito Mais! Esta é uma realização do Departamento Estadual de Trânsito (DETRAN), Governo do Estado do Ceará. This is the newest application DETRAN Ceará. With it users of smartphones and tablets get quick and friendly: - Info Driver's License (score, expiration and renewal). - Consult the vehicle plate and / or RENAVAM. - Generation of barcode to pay fees via Internet Banking. - Information on intercity passenger road transport (buses and vans) - Submission of criticism, complaints and reports directly to the ombudsman agency. - My DMV Mobile: the integrated management of CNH and the DMV vehicle in the palm of your hand. - Much More! This is a realization of the State Traffic Department (DMV), the State of Ceará.
release_text: Exibição da funcionalidade Detran mais próximo corrigida, melhor estabilidade e correção de bugs.

description: Infraero Online Flights is the application made for those who want to make an air travel without surprises or problems. In addition to consulting flights departure and arrivals schedules * in 50 Brazilian airports, now you are able to know the distance from where you are until the airport that you need to go and share your flight information through SMS, e-mail, Facebook or Twitter. If you travel always in the same flight, you can add it as favorite and make your consultation even easier. Still, you can see the weather forecast for the city in which the airport is located, and you will have access to Passenger’s Guide with major information on airport functioning, and several other topics connected to air travelling, which are available since the first version. * Airlines are responsible for flights status update.
release_text: NEW VERSION, with new layout, new functionalities and, now, also available in English and Spanish.

description: This is a game for those who like to use your head, a puzzle game, challenging and exciting. Try to solve problems as fast as you can. Share your records with the world, see if you can quickly solve each level of the game.
